name: What You Take With You
description:
My submission to MechJam III

The story of a mech pilot who has to clear out his cockpit one last time.

Elements of find the hidden object and interactive fiction. Relatively short game you can play in your browser.

All art, words and programing was done by me, DJMSpaint. 

For more art follow me on instagram @DJMSpaint

Submitting to the game jam very hot, so if you find bugs or grammatical/spelling errors please let me know. I may come back to flesh out some of this in the future.

Made with Wick Editor 1.19.3
